name: Viking ship - BRS
description:
Best ride simulators presents you one of its simulators Viking Ship! Try it and comment!

Features:

Attraction with HD graphics and animations and realistic physics
Very intuitive controls of all parts of the attraction, mechanics, lights, effects ...
You can put the attraction day and night
Up to 8 cameras to choose from
High quality sound and effects

The Viking ship simulator is optimized for all types of mobile devices and tablets

Enjoy one of the best fairground simulators!
